How to diagnose Medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency ?,"How is medium-chain acyl-coenzyme A dehydrogenase deficiency (MCADD) diagnosed? MCADD is now included in many newborn screening programs. If a newborn screening result for MCADD is not in the normal range, additional testing is recommended.
